org.apache.archiva.repository

Class AbstractManagedRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.repository.AbstractRepository
      • org.apache.archiva.repository.AbstractManagedRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EditableManagedRepository, EditableRepository, ManagedRepository, Repository, RepositoryEventHandler, RepositoryEventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicManagedRepository, MavenManagedRepository

    public abstract class AbstractManagedRepository
extends AbstractRepository
implements EditableManagedRepository
    Simple implementation of a managed repository.
